title: Spain to approve ‘extraordinary regularisation’ of half a million migrants
summary_full: Opposition leader Alberto Núñez Feijóo accused Sánchez of using the move to “deflect attention” from a national crisis following a series of rail accidents
summary_public: Opposition leader Alberto Núñez Feijóo accused Sánchez of using the move to “deflect attention” from a national crisis following a series of rail accidents
